improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The variable x becomes 0 after the loop, leading to a division by zero exception in the statement `y = (1 / x);`.
Add a check to ensure x is not zero before the division operation to prevent the runtime error. For example: `if (x != 0) { y = (1 / x); } else { /* Handle the case where x is zero */ }`
The loop iterates 10 times, decreasing x each time. After the loop, x will be 0.  The subsequent division by x will cause a runtime error.
